description: A 14KM easy to moderate hike depending on your fitness, the travels along the Westwood Ridges down to Witchcraft Lake and comes back along the lower trail.  Great views of Westwood Lake and Mt. Benson.The trail starts at Morrell Sanctuary following the Robert's Roost trail, then branches off up to the Westwood Ridges, then drops down to the Witchcraft Lake trail.  When coming back, you can retrace your steps and go back along the Weswood Ridges or come back along the lower trail (as in the GPS).
directions: To get to Morrell Sanctuary drive south on Wakesiah Avenue from 5th St, and turn right onto Nanaimo Lakes Road. Morden Colliery Provincial Park will be the forest on your left, and the military base is on the right. After passing underneath the Parkway, the road will curve to the left, but you want to watch for the Morrell Sanctuary sign on the right. Turn into the driveway; there's a parking lot about 40 metres in.
title: Morrell Sancturary to Witchcraft Lake Return
